none: media/user/SCRAPE/test/2011-07-napalm-raid/extracted/napalm raid/01 Out Of Sight, Out Of Mind
Napalm Raid - Corruption Of Their Little Minds demo 2010
Corruption Of Their Little Minds demo 2010
Napalm Raid - Corruption Of Their Little Minds demo 2010

Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on July 04, 2011 Description from Terminal Escape:
Definitely more crust than noise, NAPALM RAID crash through eight tunes filled with amped up DOOM riffing and heavy Japanese hardcore influences. Everything here is pretty much by the book, but not unlike yesterday's post - if you're going to do it, then you had better fukkn do it right. Love the guitar leads, especially the metallic bits on "Run Like Hell," and the gutteral vocals push this tape over the top. Also,  since it's America day...they are from Canada. CORRUPTION OF THEIR LITTLE MINDS NAPALM RAID are touring the West Coast now, and most of these songs got crammed onto an EP by the Rust And Machine folks. 
//4.bp.blogspot.com/-HABxOXYf2EU/ThEGt3SMK4I/AAAAAAAABv8/ZARaLe0X9fo/s1600/Napalm+Raid+cover+copy.jpg http://napalmraid.blogspot.com/ http://rustandmachine.storenvy.com/collections/4716-rust-and-machine-releases //1.bp.blogspot.com/--Mc6DmM9LgI/ThEItpBve-I/AAAAAAAABwA/FPGc7HGY1bU/s1600/napalm+Raid+img+copy.jpg
